TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示將處理 控制項的 事件或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event or event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件方法，以及它會通知已開始連線程序 （例如，使用者已選取的控制項並按一下連接的動詞命令），但尚未完成。The event is raised by the method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed. 這個事件會提供完成之前取消連線的機會。The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete. 如果已成功完成連線，此事件後面接著事件。If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 就會引發事件方法，並發出訊號事實使用者已按一下中斷連線動詞或否則呼叫方法。The event is raised by the method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the method has otherwise been called. 這個事件會提供取消處理程序完成之前結束連接的機會。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete. 如果連接就會順利結束，此事件後面接著事件。If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the event. 中指定的方法委派時，會呼叫或就會引發事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when a or event is raised. 網頁開發人員可以加入，將事件的自訂處理常式`OnWebPartsDisconnecting`和`OnWebPartsConnecting`屬性至``項目，並指派給屬性的自訂方法的名稱。Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes. 自訂處理常式也可以指派以程式設計的方式。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 如需有關以程式設計的方式指派的事件處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 連接事件處理常式方法的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
